2025 Memberships
Prices include sales tax and each price is a link to purchase your membership.                                   Pay before January 1st, 2025 to receive a bonus bar credit.
ALL MEMBERSHIP’S INCLUDE A USGA/WSGA HANDICAP AND DRIVING RANGE.

(Contact Sam to purchase a handicap if you don’t have a membership)
Membership Perks:
10% OFF on Pro Shop Merchandise (excluding sale items).
$40 Guest Fee rate.
Range Balls are included.
WSGA/ USGA Handicap (contact Sam to have it activated).

Contact Us

DIRECTIONS
From the Twin Cities or from Western Wisconsin
- 94 to the Somerset exit (exit #4)
- Go north approximately 5 miles through Burkhardt
- Just after Burkhardt, turn left on County Road I into Somerset
- Take a right at stoplight and go 1/2 mile
- Take a left onto County Road C north
- Go 2.1 miles - Bristol Ridge Golf Course is on the left
From the Twin Cities (Stillwater area)
- Take Highway 36 to Stillwater
- Cross the St. Croix River bridge into Wisconsin
- Go 9 miles on 64 East to 2nd Somerset exit (Exit 9, 35 North)
- At top of exit, take a left towards Somerset
- Go 1/4 mile and take a right onto County Road C North
- Go 2.1 miles (Bristol Ridge Golf Course is on the left)
